name: Number of NPN-equivalence classes of balanced monotone Boolean functions of n or fewer variables.
comment: a(n) is also the number of NPN-equivalence classes of balanced unate Boolean functions of n or fewer variables.
link: Aniruddha Biswas and Palash Sarkar, Counting unate and balanced monotone Boolean functions, arXiv:2304.14069 [math.CO], 2023.
author: _Aniruddha Biswas_, Nov 22 2024
